This place was so mid that I wanted to go backwards in time to un-mid my senses and get my $50 back. The food is aight if you like everything on the pricier side. I‚Äôm guessing a lot of money goes into advertising but it‚Äôs just an empty shell. But lol to all the AI graphics on the TV screens. This is the kinda spot influencers are paid to write positive reviews about and show off their trendy but empty personalities. Look, more power to them but if they aren‚Äôt paying the outrageous prices for Colombian bar food ‚Äî but to everyone else ‚Äî don‚Äôt trust the optics here. I thought service was nice and everything was fine enough but there is an underlining feeling of being scammed for a mediocre meal.

The steak quesadilla is 80% cheese and 20% steak - where's the steak? Lol. So much cheese I had take some off, it wasn't gooey melted, it was clumpy. :( Not sure if it was an off day, I did get my food delivered and the quesadilla was lukewarm. When your fridge doesn't have the ingredients to make a killer quesadilla, you can check out this place to kill a craving. Whether you're satisfied or not, that's up to you. Was it worth it personally? I don't foresee ordering again.
Excelente ambiente, comida deliciosa y excelente servicio

Ped√≠ un desgranado y hab√≠a mas papas de paquete que ma√≠z. Estaba muy seco. Es tambi√©n ma√≠z del de lata. Esperaba que fuese ma√≠z desgranado. Tambi√©n pedimos una hamburguesa que fue otra decepci√≥n y unas papas que llegaron muy blandas como viejas y con ‚Äúqueso gratinado‚Äù (estaba quemado). No te env√≠an salsas adicionales. No recomiendo pedir domicilio (ni aunque est√©s muy cerca, nosotros estamos a solo unas cuadras).

I came out on a Saturday at 10pm to grab a quick bite and decided to hit up this spot for a second time. Like the first, the food, vibes, and service was flawless. I got sat down within a min, ordered my food and got it within 10 mins. Everything was savory and fresh and absolutely delicious! Laura was my server and she was super sweet and attentive. The food here gave me the fuel to then go check out all the dance spots that were next door and within walking distance. This is definitely a go to spot for food right before a long dance night out. Rate 10 out of 10!

Es la segunda vez que pedimos hamburguesas en este lugar la primera vez estuvieron bien, pero en esta ocasi√≥n total decepci√≥n la carne de res s√∫per seca demasiado cosida y la de pollo hasta quemada y seca, entiendo que tienen varias √≥rdenes tuvimos la paciencia para esperar un poco m√°s de una hora ordenamos en el truck para pick up para esto tan decepcionante, se√±or due√±o es necesario que hable con sus cocineros!!

Everything is good, true burgers, the fries amazing. Not the first time, and not the last definitely.
I will recommend try here the burgers, they are delicious ü§§

Latino Bites is literally one of my absolute favorite places to eat and hang out ! The atmosphere is really nice, especially the outdoor seating. The food is top tier delicious Colombian food. I always get the angus burger and it never disappoints, and to top it all off the staff is so friendly.

rico. Mi esposo le canto todo! Vamos a regresar!
Super amazing, very quick service!! Kari was so amazing as our waitress I can‚Äôt wait to be back, also food was delicious i recommending getting the chicharr√≥n as an appetizer it was addicting!

The staff is great.The hostess is a great.The food is great.The hemisphere is great.I mean, the place is beautiful located on eighty fifth street on northern boulevard, between 84fifth and 85 fourth street.

Luego de casi 6 a√±os ordenando en este lugar, tanto como en delivery o en el restaurante. Solo puedo decir que la calidad a bajado mucho. Acabo de ordenar para delivery una salchipapa con en entra√±a y recib√≠ una orden de papas con 4 pedazos finos de entra√±a y salchichas picadas en trocitos. Entiendo que el costo de todo los productos han subido, pero ya esto es avaricia. No espero que me den comida para 3 d√≠as, pero si algo que pueda satisfacer al cliente.

Desde que llegamos fue una excelente atenci√≥n el lugar muy agradable, al persona que nos atendi√≥ Mar√≠a lucia muy formal y una muy buena atenci√≥n desde el inicio hasta el final, la comida tienen variedad en sus platos con buen sabor y saz√≥n
Uno siempre vuelve a donde fue feliz! Excelente el servicio de Adriana y Esmeralda! La pizza 10/10 ü´∂‚Ä¶

Tried the chorizo and filet mignon quesadillas. Honestly, for the money that I spent and the apparently great ratings that this place has, I thought the food was average at best. I know a few places in Queens alone where you could get a better quesadilla for cheaper, most of them with more meat too. On the bright side, it had some diced tomatoes and sour cream on the side which was appreciated. They have a lot of other options on the menu which might be worth a try but I do think the menu prices seem to be on the high side.

This place became a guilty pleasure of mine. Everything I have tried so far has completely blown my mind and makes me wonder how there is such a perfect balance of flavor with every bite. Nothing over powers each other. It is incredible. The food is fun and interesting, and the best part is their signature sauces can be bought so you can bring some Latino bites home and create some new interesting dishes. üòÄ

The food is delicious , economical and great ambiance. All the waitress and hostess are superb, kind and respectful. Loved Melanie the last girl that served my aunt and myself so sweet attentive and accommodating loved her vibe. Latino bites is a go too for yummy fast Colombian food.

I recently had the pleasure of dining at Latino Bites in Jackson Heights, and it was an exceptional experience from start to finish. The food was flavorful and authentic, showcasing the best of Latin cuisine, but what truly stood out was the incredible service.

Our server, Adriana, went above and beyond to make us feel welcome. She was attentive, kind, and added a special touch to our evening. When she noticed my daughter getting a little restless, she surprised her with a small toy, which instantly brought a big smile to her face and made our family feel even more cared for.

The atmosphere at Latino Bites is warm and inviting, perfect for a family meal or a casual night out. Every dish we tried was delicious, and Adriana‚Äôs thoughtful gesture made our visit truly memorable.

If you‚Äôre looking for great food and top-notch service in Jackson Heights, Latino Bites is the place to go. Be sure to ask for Adriana‚Äîshe‚Äôll make your experience even better!

5/5 stars.

Stopped by after my salon appointment to grab a quick bite before meeting up with friends for project. The atmosphere is vibrant yet cozy with the wooden tables and colorful banners. I ordered chorizo tacos and they were delicious. Place was not super busy during a weekday afternoon but I saw families starting to enter as I was leaving. Would come again and sit in the patio before summer‚Äôs over!

Honestly everything about this place is amazing. It's homey, the food is delicious, it feels very local and cozy the food was amazing. Estaphania was amazing! Shout out to her! On Friday nights they have a DJ which made it a little loud but it was such a vibe me and my friends had an amazing time.

I recently had the pleasure of dining at Latino Bite, and I must say, it was an exceptional experience from start to finish. The food was simply amazing, bursting with authentic flavors that transported us straight to Latin America. Every dish was a delightful blend of spices and ingredients that showcased the culinary heritage of the region.
What truly made our visit memorable was the outstanding service provided by Judy. She went above and beyond to assist my parents, who were trying Latin American cuisine for the first time. Judy was incredibly patient and knowledgeable, taking the time to explain the menu and make recommendations based on our preferences. Her warm and friendly demeanor made us feel welcome and well cared for.
From the vibrant decor to the lively atmosphere, everything about Latino Bite was perfect. It's a must-visit for anyone looking to enjoy delicious food and top-notch service. We will definitely be returning soon!

Melanie was an amazing server‚Äîsuper friendly and attentive. The food was absolutely delicious, full of authentic Latin flavor, and every bite was a hit. The music and overall ambiente made the whole experience feel like a mini vacation. Highly recommend!

Amazing food, atmosphere, and service. Our waiter Judy gave us very good service, quick with getting our order and bringing our food to the table. The food was delicious: savory, spectacular, and very tasty. Will definitely come back again when i find myself around.
